OOC: My email is screwed, so I'll have to use egroups for awile.

::DrillBit::

DrillBit arrived at the battle.
"DrillBit, TERRORIZE!" He transformed. His optic lazers, insect leg 
machine guns, and giant gattaling gun arm, aimed at the enemys. He 
opened heavy fire on the Megatron, and Inferno clones.
